title: Web Development
desc: Building responsive, scalable web applications using React, Node.js, Angular, Laravel, and modern frameworks for optimal performance and user experience.

title: Graphic Design & Branding
desc: Creating compelling visual identities, logos, brochures, and complete brand identity systems including style guides and marketing materials.

title: UI/UX Design
desc: Designing intuitive and beautiful user interfaces that combine clean visual design with seamless user experience using Figma and Adobe tools.

title: Database Administration
desc: Designing and managing robust database solutions with Oracle, SQL Server, MongoDB, and Oracle APEX for optimal data performance and security.

title: Social Media Management
desc: Managing social media presence, creating engaging content, and growing your audience across multiple platforms with strategic campaigns.

title: SEO & Digital Marketing
desc: Optimizing websites for search engines using RankMath, MailChimp, and implementing digital marketing strategies to increase online visibility.

title: E-commerce Solutions
desc: Building custom e-commerce platforms with integrated payment gateways, inventory management systems, and seamless shopping experiences.

title: Video Editing & Content Creation
desc: Professional video editing using Premiere Pro, After Effects, DaVinci Resolve, and InShot for engaging multimedia content creation.

title: Project Management
desc: Managing complex projects from concept to completion, coordinating teams, and ensuring timely delivery of high-quality digital solutions.

title: IT Consulting
desc: Providing expert IT consultation, system analysis, and strategic technology solutions to help businesses optimize their digital infrastructure.
